section.title: Toolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptions Class Reference

para.para: Configuration options for OpenTelemetry integration in Toolbox.

listitem.para: The configuration section name for telemetry options.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether distributed tracing is enabled.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether metrics collection is enabled.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether console export is enabled.
Gets or sets the OTLP endpoint for telemetry export.
Gets or sets the service name for telemetry identification.
Gets or sets the service version for telemetry identification.

section.para: Configuration options for OpenTelemetry integration in Toolbox.

section.section:
Property Documentation
EnableConsoleExport EnableConsoleExportToolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptions Toolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptionsEnableConsoleExport
bool Toolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptions.EnableConsoleExport[get], [set]
Gets or sets a value indicating whether console export is enabled.
true to export telemetry to console; false to disable. Defaults to false.
Enable this for debugging purposes only. Not recommended for production.
Definition at line 55 of file ToolboxTelemetryOptions.cs.
EnableMetrics EnableMetricsToolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptions Toolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptionsEnableMetrics
bool Toolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptions.EnableMetrics = true[get], [set]
Gets or sets a value indicating whether metrics collection is enabled.
true to enable metrics; false to disable. Defaults to true.
Definition at line 44 of file ToolboxTelemetryOptions.cs.
EnableTracing EnableTracingToolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptions Toolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptionsEnableTracing
bool Toolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptions.EnableTracing = true[get], [set]
Gets or sets a value indicating whether distributed tracing is enabled.
true to enable tracing; false to disable. Defaults to true.
Definition at line 36 of file ToolboxTelemetryOptions.cs.
OtlpEndpoint OtlpEndpointToolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptions Toolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptionsOtlpEndpoint
string? Toolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptions.OtlpEndpoint[get], [set]
Gets or sets the OTLP endpoint for telemetry export.
The OTLP endpoint URL. Defaults to null (OTLP export disabled).
Example: http://localhost:4317 for a local OTLP collector.

string Toolbox.Core.Options.ToolboxTelemetryOptions.ServiceName = "Toolbox"[get], [set]
Gets or sets the service name for telemetry identification.
The service name used in telemetry. Defaults to "Toolbox".
